strapiEvent.name: The Dirty South
strapiEvent.organization: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art
strapiEvent.location: Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art - Bentonville, AR
strapiEvent.description:
Summer at Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art never disappoints with 120 acres in full bloom and new exhibitions and events ready to inspire. 

  • Go see: This year, Crystal Bridges is bursting with every rendition of art for you to experience, from an outdoor architecture exhibition to festivities of celebration and concerts to an original print of a US document arriving at the galleries.
  • Coming up: Today begins a weekend dedicated to The Dirty South, an exhibition celebrating Black culture. In addition to a lineup of events through June 17, there will be free admission to The Dirty South June 18-19.

Check out the Crystal Bridges summer guide HERE.
